keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCBA

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCBA.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    Class to store a non-fuzzy rule, together with some necessary information to manage the CBA algorithm.
    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Jesus Alcala (University of Granada) 09/02/2010

      • setLabel

        public void setLabel(int pos,

        It sets the label for a given position in the antecedent (for a given attribute).
        Parameters:

        label - New label value to set

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object a)
        Function to compare objects of the Rule class. Necessary to be able to use "sort" function It sorts in an decreasing order of confidence If equals, in an decreasing order of support If equals, in an decreasing order of time
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
        Parameters:
        a - Rule object to compare with.
        Returns:
        1 if a is bigger, -1 if smaller and 0 otherwise.
